mapper.select: select a.g_seq,a.g_title,a.g_price,a.g_qty,a.g_delivery,b.g_attach,b.g_content from goods a join goods_info b on a.g_seq=b.g_seq where a.g_seq=#{g_seq}
mapper.update: update goods set g_title=#{g_title}, g_content=#{g_content} where g_seq = #{g_seq};
mapper.select: select a.g_seq,a.g_title,a.g_price,a.g_qty,a.g_delivery,b.g_attach from goods a join goods_info b on a.g_seq=b.g_seq order by g_seq desc limit #{startrow},#{endrow}
select count(*) from goods where b_title like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') or b_name like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') or b_content like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%')

select * from goods where b_title like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') or b_name like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') or b_content like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') order by b_ref desc, b_step asc limit #{startrow},#{endrow}
select count(*) from tb_cart where member_id=#{member_id}

select a.g_seq,a.checkYn,a.qty,a.totalprice,b.g_price,b.g_title,b.g_delivery,c.g_attach from tb_cart a join goods b on a.g_seq=b.g_seq join goods_info c on b.g_seq=c.g_seq where member_id=#{member_id}
select sum(totalprice) totalprice,sum(b.g_delivery) deliveryTotalPrice,sum(qty) qty from tb_cart a join goods b on a.g_seq=b.g_seq where member_id=#{member_id} and checkYn='y'

select a.g_seq,a.checkYn,a.g_price,a.qty,a.totalprice,b.g_title,b.g_delivery,c.g_attach from tb_cart a join goods b on a.g_seq=b.g_seq join goods_info c on b.g_seq=c.g_seq where member_id=#{member_id} and checkYn='y'
mapper.delete: delete from tb_cart where g_seq=#{g_seq} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.update: update tb_cart set qty=#{qty},totalprice=#{qty}*g_price where g_seq =#{g_seq} and member_id=#{member_id}
